title: Costa Rica Producer Prices
description: Producer Prices in Costa Rica decreased to 147.60 points in October from 148.04 points in September of 2022. Producer Prices in Costa Rica averaged 174.39 points from 1995 until 2022, reaching an all time high of 373.75 points in June of 2014 and a record low of 56.31 points in January of 1995. In Costa Rica, the Producer Price Index measures the average change in price of goods and services sold by manufacturers and producers in the wholesale market during a given period. This page provides - Costa Rica Producer Prices - actual values, historical data, forecast, chart, statistics, economic calendar and news.
author: Central Bank of Costa Rica
